//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	if(args[2]!=undefined){num=args[2]}
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
	 
 //try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ url = "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/androidChapterBatchDownload,"; body = "versionCode=313&novelId="+baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]+"&chapterIds="+baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]+"&token="+String(source.getLoginHeader()) option = { "method":"POST", "body":String(body) } url = url+JSON.stringify(option); html = java.ajax(url) java.setContent(html) } intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="ㅤ"} //评论开启 bbb = book.getVariable("custom") sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)) { body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.name: title

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");
sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}else{num=num}

title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	title = title + " ❖ "+intro
	}else{
		title = title
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}

l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号

填写 [目录简介] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

let DEVICE_ID = String(java.randomUUID());
let APP_DEVICE = (length => {
  let chars = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
  let result = ''
  for (var i = length; i > 0; --i) {
    result += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)]
  }
  return result
})(50);

  let t = parseInt(Date.now() / 1000)
  let hex_t = `0x${t.toString(16)}`
  let md5_t = java.digestHex(t.toString(), "md5")
  let a = `${TOKEN}${md5_t}$${DEVICE_ID}&${PACKAGE_NAME}`;
  let md5_a = java.digestHex(String(java.base64Encode(a)),"md5")
  let token = `${md5_a}${DEVICE_ID}${hex_t}`

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!/apk\/detail/.test(baseUrl)){
    let id = "{{$.data.id}}";
    let html = ""
    let item = JSON.parse(result).data;
    let curPage = 1;
    let lastItem = "";
    let resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id={{$.data.id}}&page=1&lastItem="));
    let replynum5 = item.replynum;
    replynum5 > 100?replynum5=100:replynum5
    html += createReply(item)
    let item_reply = []
    let totalnum = 0
    let item2 = resp2.data
    item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    while (item2.length && (totalnum = totalnum + item2.length) < replynum5) {
      curPage = curPage + 1
      lastItem = item2[item2.length - 1].id
      resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id=${id}&page=${curPage}&lastItem=${lastItem}`))
      item2 = resp2.data
      item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    }

    let grouped_item_reply = {}
    item_reply.map(item => {
      if (item.rrid) {
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] = grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid].push(item)
      } else {
        grouped_item_reply[item.id] = grouped_item_reply[item.id] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.id].push(item)
      }
    })
    for (key in grouped_item_reply) {
      grouped_item_reply[key].sort((e1, e2) => {
        return e1.dateline - e2.dateline
      }).map(item => html += createReply(item, !!item.rrid))
    }
    result = String(html).replace(/<a .*?href="([^"]+)".*?>([^<]+)<\/a>/g,'▪$2：$1▪')
   }else{
   	let html = "软件地址：\nhttps://www.coolapk.com/apk/{{$.data.apkname}}\n";
   	 html +="---复制下面文字到发现规则可看评论---\n"
   	html += "{{$.data.title}}▪回复::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=&title=最近回复&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪发布::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id=256030&sort=dateline_desc&title=最近发布&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪热度::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=popular&title=热度排序&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"
   	}
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
此书源可以开箱即用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，所有API均来自于共享地址池，而共享地址池的地址来自于各个搭建番茄Web（frpc版）的用户
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量一起共建此服务（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
搭建方法加群了解（选择内网穿透frpc版本）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
本书源使用frpc版本开启内网穿透后制作，欢迎大家下载frp版本开启穿透挂后台为本书源提供节点
番茄Web地址：https://github.com/fengyuecanzhu/FQWeb （点点star吧谢谢了）
交流群：887847462
模块下载链接：https://www.lanzoum.com/b00o3g1kf
集成版下载链接：https://www.123pan.com/s/ib9LVv-IHiwd.html

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
此书源可以导入即可使用，无需进行其他操作
但由于此书源API来自于番茄Web共享API服务项目，所有API均来自于共享地址池，而共享地址池的地址来自于各个搭建番茄Web（frpc版）的用户
因此，如果你有能力搭建番茄web服务，请尽量一起共建此服务（如果所有人都选择白嫖而不去搭建，那么所有人都将无法使用此API/书源）
搭建方法加群了解（选择内网穿透frpc版本）
此书源使用Xposed模块番茄Web 搭建
本书源使用frpc版本开启内网穿透后制作，欢迎大家下载frp版本开启穿透挂后台为本书源提供节点
番茄Web地址：https://github.com/fengyuecanzhu/FQWeb （点点star吧谢谢了）
交流群：887847462
模块下载链接：https://www.lanzoum.com/b00o3g1kf
集成版下载链接：https://www.123pan.com/s/ib9LVv-IHiwd.html

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = source.bookSourceUrl +  `/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: title<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP章节.|免费章节.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订/万架字票合补加].*?[】）\)]</js>

  let variable = source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
      source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
      java.toast("请按照规则修改源变量，已重置源变量！")
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
    source.variable = JSON.stringify(defaultVariable);
  }
  let header = {
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; MI 8 Lite Build/QKQ1.190910.002) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/113.0.5672.62 Mobile Safari/537.36"
  }
  if(variable.cookie){
    header.cookie = variable.cookie;
  }
  JSON.stringify(header)
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `http://list.fqapi.jilulu.cn/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      c.updateTime = '更新时间: ' + java.timeFormat(c.firstPassTime*1000);
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "第一卷：默认"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  } else {
    variable = defaultVariable;
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      c.url  = `http://list.api-fanqienovel.sunianyun.live/random#/content?item_id=${c.itemId}`;
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName: title<js>##正文卷.|正文.|VIP章节.|免费章节.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更谢乐发订/万架字票合补加].*?[】）\)]</js>

<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='换源列表（点击设置书籍变量，输入序号，确认后刷新，可更改对应的源，默认为0）\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n--------------\n'+intro
</js>

var list = [{text:'第1页',href:baseUrl}];
if(ys>=2){
for(var i=2;i<=ys;i++){
var url = baseUrl.replace(/.html/,'')
var html = url+'_'+i+'.html';
list.push({text:'第'+i+'页',href:html});
}}
list;
</js>

<js>var page=result.match(/\(第\d+\/(\d+)页\)当前\d+条\/页/)[1];
var id=baseUrl.match(/\d+/)
if(baseUrl.match(/_1/)){
	var url=baseUrl;
	}else{
		var go=baseUrl.replace(/list|.html/g,"");
		var url=String(go+"/"+id+"_1/");
}
var list=[];
for(var i=2;i<=page;i++){list.push(url.replace(/_1/,'_'+i))}
list;</js>

}else{page=page}

}

list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/10);
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <pageCount; i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('&')[0] + '&type=all&page=' + index + '&pageSize=10&sort_field=create_time&sort_value=desc'};
}
list;
</js>
